gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Kings 121, Grizzlies 111
gameRecap.excerpt: The Kings defeated the Grizzlies, 121-111, in overtime. Malik Monk led all scorers with 28 points, along with six rebounds and six assists for the Kings, while Domantas Sabonis added 25 points, 18 rebounds and five assists in the victory, extending his double-double streak to 50 games. Jaren Jackson Jr. (25 points, four assists, four blocks) and Desmond Bane (24 points, five rebounds, four assists) combined for 49 points for the Grizzlies in the losing effort. The Kings improve to 39-28 on the season, while the Grizzlies fall to 23-46.
